entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 3 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
